thread.title: WATCH: CNN Reporter Breaks Down On-Air After Admin Calls Only on Conser. Media
thread.title_full: WATCH: CNN Reporter Breaks Down On-Air After Admin Calls Only on Conser. Media

author: Kim Smith
title: WATCH: CNN Reporter Breaks Down On-Air After Admin Calls Only on Conser. Media
text:
Wash. Post Trashes Trump for DoD at Trump Tower… Virtually Ignores Biden Charging Secret Service RENT! 
It would seem like all that waiting and being overlooked has taken its toll on liberal news outlets. After the conference, CNN’s Jim Acosta had a near meltdown, explaining how the mainstream media are being stiffed. Obviously, his feelings were hurt. 
Acosta, who attended the news conference but was not called upon, explained that the two questions that were taken came from the Christian Broadcasting Network, which he described as a “very conservative broadcasting network” and TownHall.com, which he said is a “very conservative website.” 
“And so in the last three news conferences, all of the questions to the American news media have been handled by conservative press. And, I think, there’s no other way to describe it, but the fix is in ,” he said. Advertisement - story continues below 
Well, there’s really no other way to describe Acosta’s statement but “whining.” 
Acosta, whom the president accused of being fake news in January, also claimed the president didn’t want to answer critical questions. CNN reporter @Acosta after Trump calls on only right-wing outlets for the third straight press conference: "The fix is in" pic.twitter.com/FPtaGEIenC 
— John Whitehouse (@existentialfish) February 15, 2017 
Really. It’s oddly satisfying to watch a reporter from CNN complain about how the president overlooking him. Advertisement - story continues below Trending Stories
